lead_paragraph: Gelsomina and her sisters live in the Italian countryside, in an isolated, pastoral environment created by their stoic father. The family's strict order begins to fall apart at the end of one summer with the arrival of a German boy who is part of a youth rehabilitation program and the family's participation in a local TV competition called "Village Wonders."
